channel.title: Lawrence's 562 cPanel
channel.description:
[center]Ok, So first it's made for my Project Awesomness 562 source but it should work with all the 562 sources because most of commands uses the base of the 562 PS.
Features _________________ Panel : Player name *Username of the player you want to modify or send command to. *Online Players User+pass list. (Will be live soon, you need to refresh before using right now. Panel : Admin *Kick button *Ban button *Unban button *Give Mod button *Give Admin button *Give hidden admin button *Demote button Panel : Donator *Give donator button *Take donator button *Give money button+Amount box *Give Item button + ID box + Amount box *Give master button *Give Pure button *Give Invincible button *Remove invincible button Panel : Misc *Kill player button *Kill all players button *Send Message to single player button *Send Message to all players button *Message box for the both send message commands *Player 2 Player teleport button (Player name in the Player name panel is the teleported and the box above the button is for the one that will receive the other player.) Panel : logs & mute ctrl *Live chat logs box! *Mute, UnMute and Player name button.
Pics ________________ [img]http://i.imgur.com/4s7Zx.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/U2RPO.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/z3lWV.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/Wrfxx.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/nHYIR.png[/img]
Update -- 6/21/2011 _____________________ features ___________ *New panel : say. You can make one or all players say anything you want! *Now, the content of the player list panel is at the right of the panels and it stays here. It's now live but it wont show if the player has logged out if he Xlog so the refresh button is still here. pics ___________ [img]http://i.imgur.com/x9y4H.png[/img]
Please comment and suggest!

item.title: Lawrence's 562 cPanel
item.dc:creator: @veteran_god_king_ces veteran god: king cesar
item.description:
@veteran_god_king_ces wrote:

I’ve had ideas on this topic (server cPanels) for a long time, I just never had the knowledge or the skills to churn out what i’m thinking… But this looks extremely promising, and i think, If you’re willing to take such big suggestions of course, that maybe i could help you out with your idea and maybe i could see part of my idea come to life?

So, I’ll do my best to keep this organized, and make it as detailed as i can…

My concept is to have a secondary client control panel… What i mean by that is, a control panel that is actually a separate client, rather then the usual control panel that opens as the server is started up. The benefit of this is the ability of having this control panel available to staff members in general, rather then only the owner, and possibly eliminating the messy / abundant player commands…

How this would work… (I can’t really go too in depth here, because, although i have the concepts/ideas, i don’t exactly know how it would work, if it even can be done): I assumed this “Secondary client control panel” would run as, literally a separate client from the client you play the server on… It would require your staff credentials (server username and password) it would recognize your player rights, being sufficient or insufficient, in case the control panel was leaked to the public or whatever… (for general security purposes).

also depending on the player rights, the control panel would/could have more or less options/commands, which offer more or less control to the user.

Although i’m not entirely sure how this would work, i assume it would require a bit of editing server sided in that you would need to be able to login to clients at once, and in my mind, i imagine that would bring up some conflict between the two clients…

That’s about all the detail i can come up with, as i said, I have the concepts, but how it would actually work (if even possible) i’ve no real idea…

If you’ve got any questions or if i left any detail out, let me know and i’ll try to clear it up. =P

Again, what you have here (YOUR ideas, NOT mine) looks great, it seems to have real potential and i wish you the best of luck in your development regardless of whether you want to use any of my ideas or not…

Read full topic

item.description:
@laurent_248 wrote:

m1lkman:

You could set up password protection for the admin panel and send the control panel to the moderators.

I could but it would be really easy to crack.

Read full topic

item.title: Lawrence's 562 cPanel
item.dc:creator: @Nasz Nasz
item.description:
@Nasz wrote:

m1lkman:

You could set up password protection for the admin panel and send the control panel to the moderators.

It loads up for the Owner of the server lol. The GUI get’s imported from the GameEngine, and the GUI pops up when the server is loaded. Doesn’t start when the client does <3. :rolleyes:

Read full topic

item.title: Lawrence's 562 cPanel
item.dc:creator: @laurent_248 laurent 248
item.description:
@laurent_248 wrote:

Loveandpower:

The thing is, there are several panels out there, but they are finished creations/unfinished creations. None really give specific information on what is needed, and how you design it etc.

Yeah I know but anyway they should just create their own. A beginner could do it but he needs to know Java a bit.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

The thing is, there are several panels out there, but they are finished creations/unfinished creations. None really give specific information on what is needed, and how you design it etc.

item.title: Lawrence's 562 cPanel
item.dc:creator: @laurent_248 laurent 248
item.description:
@laurent_248 wrote:

I could too but it’s easy. You just make a GUI using netbeans or eclipse if you don’t know how or you could do it by yourself then import what you need, create panels and buttons and make the button do a command like a ::command in the commandpackethandler file. Then you get Gameengine.java to start the GUI when the server is running.

Read full topic

item.title: Lawrence's 562 cPanel
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“laurent 248, post:7, topic:399972”][quote author=Marine5287 link=topic=497073.msg3638133#msg3638133 date=1308751487]
Nice this will be very useful for me.
[/quote]

If you want it I’ll release it in a tut when it’s finished.[/quote]This is to precious to release as a finished product. What I suggest is making a tutorial on how to make cpanels in general and explain it so others can create their own.

item.description:
@laurent_248 wrote:

[center]Ok, So first it’s made for my Project Awesomness 562 source but it should work with all the 562 sources because most of commands uses the base of the 562 PS.

Features

Panel : Player name
*Username of the player you want to modify or send command to.
*Online Players User+pass list. (Will be live soon, you need to refresh before using right now.
Panel : Admin
*Kick button
*Ban button
*Unban button
*Give Mod button
*Give Admin button
*Give hidden admin button
*Demote button
Panel : Donator
*Give donator button
*Take donator button
*Give money button+Amount box
*Give Item button + ID box + Amount box
*Give master button
*Give Pure button
*Give Invincible button
*Remove invincible button
Panel : Misc
*Kill player button
*Kill all players button
*Send Message to single player button
*Send Message to all players button
*Message box for the both send message commands
*Player 2 Player teleport button (Player name in the Player name panel is the teleported and the box above the button is for the one that will receive the other player.)
Panel : logs & mute ctrl
*Live chat logs box!
*Mute, UnMute and Player name button.

Pics





nHYIR.png714×355

Update – 6/21/2011

features

*New panel : say. You can make one or all players say anything you want!
*Now, the content of the player list panel is at the right of the panels and it stays here. It’s now live but it wont show if the player has logged out if he Xlog so the refresh button is still here.
